CustomField.description: This property will determine the increment factor when a document is checked in with redlines. Acceptable values for this field are "Major" or "Minor". The default value is Minor
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This property will determine the increment factor when a document is checked in with redlines. Acceptable values for this field are "Major" or "Minor". The default value is Minor
CustomField.label: Increment Checkin With Redlines
